attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.title: TRUMP=HORRIBLE - APP=HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I don’t really care what you think about it but I don’t think you should do anything like this because you are a racist person if you get this app. Fyi my pet dinosaur hates the people who like this app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I got this app and my phone was perfectly fine but now whenever I’m watching a movie a picture of trumps n*d*e pops up and it’s utterly disgusting!!!! Me and my friend Karen find it so horrible! 0/10

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!
attributes.review: I swear this app got on my nerves! it messed with my home button and constantly had ads. I HATE ADS!! I thought this app was going to give me relevant information, but no. All it gave me was his skin care routine

attributes.title: SCAMMED
